thread.title: Peeple: The cult of ratings is destroying us, one star at a time
thread.title_full: Peeple: The cult of ratings is destroying us, one star at a time

author: Chris Moss
title: Peeple: The cult of ratings is destroying us, one star at a time
text: Thinking Man Peeple: The cult of ratings is destroying us, one star at a time A new app that lets users rate other human beings out of five stars is the ultimate extension of our addiction to ranking things. Chris Moss gives it zero-minus-infinity High Fidelity documented one man's urge to categorise his music Photo: High Fidelity By Chris Moss
